metadata.description: This dataset contains fungi observations in Otautahi / Christchurch, New Zealand from iNaturalist. It includes details such as the date and location of the observation, the user who made the observation, and the taxon observed.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique iNaturalist identifier for the observation

attributes.name: user_login
attributes.description: Username of the user who made the observation on iNaturalist

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Scientific name of the observed taxon

attributes.name: preferred_common_name
attributes.description: Preferred common name of the observed taxon (if given)

attributes.name: photo_url
attributes.description: URL of the first photo associated with the observation if available

dimensions.name: created_at
dimensions.description: Timestamp of when the observation was created

code_lists.name: native
code_lists.description: Whether the observed taxon is native to the location
